title: Home for Rent Near 285 & 470
posting_body: ['Very comfortable color coordinated 4 bedroom/2 bath tri-level home in a friendly neighborhood with living room on main level and separate family room on lower level.', ' Located near 470 and 285;', 'Morrison mailing address', 'but feels like Littleton/Lakewood area.', 'Easy drive to the mountains, yet close to the city.', 'Family room has a wood burning fireplace.', ' The lower level is set up for privacy with bedroom, bathroom and family room.', 'Air condition window units in two of the upstairs bedrooms.', 'Corner lot with large fenced backyard, patio, garden, outside party lights, mature trees and sprinkler system.', ' Fully furnished or optional non-furnished.', '2 car garage.', 'Newer washer/dryer located in lower bathroom.', 'Updates: inside/outside paint, roof, fireplace, water heater, flooring, kitchen, appliances.', 'Move in after September 1st, 2022.', 'Rent duration is one or two years.', ' Happy to discuss well behaved animals with higher security deposit.', ' Looking for a very reliable tenant who will care for the home as if its your own.', 'Must have verifiable income and references.', 'A background check will be performed.', ' Security deposit and first & last month rent a must.', 'Tenant pays all utilities and must keep up the landscape.', 'This home is listed for sale on Redfin.', '<URL>']
